fields.summary: ABFS: Read Buffer Manager V2 should not be allowed untill implemented
fields.description:
Read Buffer Manager V2 is a Work in progress and not yet fully ready to be used.
This is to stop any user explicitly enabling the config to enable RBMV2.

comments.body:
anujmodi2021 opened a new pull request, #8002:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/8002

   Read Buffer Manager V2 is a Work in progress and not yet fully ready to be used.
   This is to stop any user explicitly enabling the config to enable RBMV2.
   
   JIRA: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-19710

hadoop-yetus commented on PR #8002:
